dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I suggest we keep a close eye on each other and report any suspicious behavior. Let's try to gather more information before making any hasty decisions.

dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: I agree with Alice's suggestion to keep a low profile and gather more information before making any decisions. I'll focus on blending in with the villagers and avoiding any suspicious behavior that could draw attention to myself.
